index.title: RITMO, a vertical rhythm sass toolkit

configvar01.title: $BASE-FONT-SIZE: 16PX
configvar01.description: The default font size for all text in pixels

configvar02.title: $base-line-height 25px
configvar02.description: The distance between text baselines (vertical rhythm) in pixels.

configvar03.title: $rhythm-unit 'em'
configvar03.description: The length unit in which to output rhythm values. Supported values: px, em, rem. Percent units can't be used since they make calculating padding and margins impractical, and percentage borders are not valid or supported in css.

configvar04.title: $rem-with-px-fallback true
configvar04.description: Whether to output fallback values in px when using rem as the rhythm-unit.

configvar05.title: $default-rhythm-border-width 1px
configvar05.description: Default values for rhythm borders properties. Supports style alone eg. solid or list of style and color eg. solid #aaa;.

configvar07.title: $round-to-nearest-half-line false
configvar07.description: Allows the adjust-font-size-to mixin and the lines-for-font-size function to round the line height to the nearest half line height instead of the nearest integral line height to avoid large spacing between lines.

configvar08.title: $min-line-padding 2px
configvar08.description: Ensure there is at least this many pixels of vertical padding above and below the text.

mixin01.title: $BASE-FONT-SIZE: 16PX
mixin01.description: The default font size for all text in pixels
